page.title: 12SPORTS CENTRE CARSHALTON SRY
page.content: Westcroft was opened in l977. Classes of instruction can be run for any sport, provided sufficient people attend. Fencing has been tried but did not have enough support. The most popular sport in numbers is swimming. On the dry side it is badminton and 5-a-side football. It is mostly local people who use the pool. A survey was undertaken some while ago and most people who attend live no more than about 3 miles away. The most people travel is up to ten miles. One of the growth areas at the centre are the birthday parties. 646 were held last year. An outdoor play area is being built for volley ball, 5_a_side football, tennis and netball. It was decided not to build extra squash courts as squash is no longer the popular sport it was.
